page.title: 01Whiteparish-Pupils' Comments
page.content: Mostly fields and trees/eleven farms, four copses/I walk across the fields and pat the horses/the school has three classes/things I like, the village is small,there are lots of fields and footpaths/birds, deer, badgers, rabbits, foxes and hares/ people are very friendly/there is a saddlers,Mr Hyde owns it/it has a tennis court,football, cricket, and badminton clubs/fields of wild flowers/bluebells, primroses, cowslips and violets/as you go down a friend's garden you can feed the horses over the fence/large pond to the S.E./my house(Cowesfield House Farm)is very old,it has a bell tower on the garage/ there is The Fountain,The White Hart, The Kings Head and The New Inn pubs/ lots of forest areas/to have picnics and days out/after school I go to clubs.
